SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (
SELECT unq, category, ctgtype, ctggender, price, csize, color, thumbnail, hits, NVL( ( select AVG(mark) from review where goodsunq = goodsinfo.unq ),0) mark, ( (price/100)*(select off from sale where unq=goodsinfo.sale) ) saleprice, (select off from sale where unq=sale) off, substr(name,0,20) name FROM goodsinfo
WHERE ( 1=1 ) $sql$
ORDER BY unq DESC
) a ) b WHERE rn >= #s_no# AND rn <= #e_no#

SELECT unq, category, ctgtype, ctggender, price, csize, color, thumbnail, goodsimg, hits, name, NVL( ( select AVG(mark) from review where goodsunq = goodsinfo.unq ),0) mark, ( (price/100)*(select off from sale where unq=goodsinfo.sale) ) saleprice, (select off from sale where unq=sale) off FROM goodsinfo WHERE unq=#unq#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userinfo WHERE userid=#userid#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goodsinfo WHERE unq=#unq#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userinfo WHERE userid=#userid# AND pass=#pass#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM admininfo WHERE adminid=#adminid# AND adminpass=#adminpass#
SELECT userid, pass, name, to_char(birth,'yyyy-mm-dd') birth, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2, rdate, udate FROM userinfo WHERE userid=#userid#
SELECT * FROM review r, goodsinfo g WHERE r.goodsunq=g.unq and g.unq=#unq#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review r, goodsinfo g WHERE r.goodsunq=g.unq and g.unq=#unq#

SELECT c.unq, c.userid userid, c.goodsunq goodsunq, c.qty qty, nvl(substr(g.thumbnail,0,instr(g.thumbnail,'/')-1),g.thumbnail) thumbnail, CASE WHEN LENGTH(g.name) > 50 THEN SubStr(g.name, 0, 50) || '...' ELSE g.name END as name, c.color color, c.csize csize, g.price price FROM cart c, goodsinfo g WHERE c.goodsunq=g.unq and userid=#userid#
SELECT count(*) FROM cart WHERE userid=#userid#

SELECT c.unq, c.userid userid, c.goodsunq goodsunq, c.qty qty, CASE WHEN LENGTH(g.name) > 20 THEN SubStr(g.name, 0, 20) || '...' ELSE g.name END as name, c.color color, c.csize csize, g.price price FROM cart c, goodsinfo g WHERE c.goodsunq=g.unq and userid=#userid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo( userid, pass, name, birth, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2, rdate, udate ) VALUES ( #userid#, #pass#, #name#, #birth#, #phone#, #email#, #zipcode#, #address1#, #address2#, sysdate, sysdate )

INSERT INTO orderlist( unq, userid, goodsunq, csize, color, stmt, name, zipcode, address1, address2, phone, email, message ) VALUES( orderlist_seq.nextVal, #userid#, #goodsunq#, #csize#, #color#, 0, #name#, #zipcode#, #address1#, #address2#, #phone#, #email#, #message# )
INSERT INTO review ( unq, goodsunq, userid, content, rdate, udate, mark ) VALUES ( review_seq.nextval, #unq#, #userid#, #content#, sysdate, sysdate, #mark# )
INSERT INTO cart ( unq, userid, goodsunq, csize, color, qty ) VALUES ( '10000', #userid#, #unq#, #csize#, #color#, #qty# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE userinfo set name=#name#, birth=#birth#, phone=#phone#, email=#email#, zipcode=#zipcode#, address1=#address1#, address2=#address2#, udate=sysdate WHERE userid=#userid#
UPDATE goodsinfo SET hits=hits+1 WHERE unq=#unq#
UPDATE cart SET qty=#qty# WHERE unq=#unq#
